subject: docs: prioritize and organize feature tasks in TODO
body:
Added 11 new tasks to TODO.md with recommended priority order and grouping:

High Priority:
- Auto-scroll bug fix
- Spam/bot prevention with rate limiting

Normal Priority:
- Performance optimization tasks (database queries, load times)
- Join chat link share feature
- Monitoring suite (error, database, usage, reported messages)

Low Priority:
- Admin force end session feature

Tasks are grouped logically for efficient implementation (e.g., monitoring suite should be built together).
title: prioritize and organize feature tasks in TODO
